name: American McGee Presents Bad Day LA
name_original: American McGee Presents Bad Day LA
description:
Anthony is about to have a very BAD DAY

Having lost all respect for himself and his fellow man he leaves behind the privileged life of a Hollywood agent, he chooses a of homelessness, destitution, and isolation, All he wants is to be left alone, and so far he’s had his wish.

Today all that will change. As the city of Los Angeles comes under attack from zombies, terrorists, earthquakes, riots, meteor showers, and other disasters, Anthony will have to use all his street smarts to stay alive. Along the way, he will be forced to overcome his hatred of humanity and work with others to escape what has become a very Bad Day in LA.

Unique weapons, spectacular scripted events, intelligent NPC’s, compelling sound and music, and an engaging storyline.

While trying to escape the city, the player will explore real-life Los Angeles locations including Hollywood Boulevard, Venice Beach, and Beverly Hills. Combat is assisted by a rag-tag collection of supporting characters, each with unique skills, styles, and personalities.
